summary: Implements a client for transporting DCE/RPC calls over an HTTP proxy using the RPCH protocol. It constructs and parses RTS messages, establishes tunnels, creates inbound and outbound channels, manages socket I/O, flow‑control, authentication (Basic/NTLM), and error handling.
business_intent: Enable applications to perform DCE/RPC operations through firewalls or proxy servers without dealing with low‑level protocol details, providing secure and reliable RPC communication over HTTP.
